model

Interface Model

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonModel, MyModel

    public interface Model
    the model interface perform all the background calculations,than pass them to the controller. this is the facade of the model
    Since:
    2015-12-16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Chen Zissu

      • HandleDirPath

        void HandleDirPath(java.lang.String[] args)
        Handling the command :dir path
        Parameters:
        args - Array of strings,containing one string with path

      • handleGenerate3dMaze

        void handleGenerate3dMaze(java.lang.String[] paramArray)
        Handling the command:generate 3d maze name x y z algorithm name-name of the maze,x-amount of floors in maze,y-amount of rows,z-amount of columns, algorithm-prim(using MyMaze3dGenerator class)/simple (using simpleMaze3dGenerator class)
        Parameters:
        paramArray - Array of strings with the parameters i mentioned above

      • handleDisplayName

        Handling the command:display the maze name(name of the maze)
        Parameters:
        name - String Array with one string, the name of the maze that needs to be displayed

      • handleDisplayCrossSectionBy

        void handleDisplayCrossSectionBy(java.lang.String[] paramArray)
        Handling the command:display cross section by (x,y,z) index for name
        Parameters:
        paramArray - Array of strings containing the axis(x, y or z), floor of the maze we created

      • handleSaveMaze

        Handling the command:save maze name file name name-maze name generated before,file name-the name of the file to save maze to
        Parameters:
        paramArray - array of strings with the parameters of name and storage

      • handleFileSize

        void handleFileSize(java.lang.String[] name)
        handling command:file size name measure the size of maze constructed with bytes array in a file
        Parameters:
        name - array of one string with the name of the file

      • handleSolve

        void handleSolve(java.lang.String[] paramArray)
        handle command:solve name algorithm solves the maze specified,with specified algorithm bfs/AstarAirDistance/AstarManhattenDistance
        Parameters:
        paramArray - array of 2 strings:cell 0-name of the maze,1-the algorithm's name to find the solution of this maze

      • handleDisplaySolution

        void handleDisplaySolution(java.lang.String[] name)
        handle command:display solution name display the path from the start position and the goal position
        Parameters:
        name - string array of the name of the maze

      • handleExitCommand

        Parameters:
